description:
Tencent, based in China, is one of the world's largest companies in the social networking space. This talk discusses how Tencent modified the code of Postgres-XC to meet their internal payment system requirements.

http://www.pgconf.us/2016/event/148/how-tencent-uses-postgres-xc-for-their-high-volume-wechat-payment-system/
title: How Tencent uses Postgres XC for their high volume WeChat payment system  Jasonys Li mp4
